org.ivar.leveltools.Level

type
class
subclasses
org.ivar.leveltools.DameLevel, org.ivar.leveltools.TiledLevel

Constructor

private new(assetsPath : String, tilemapAddCallback : TilemapAddCallback, objectAddCallback : ObjectAddCallback)
Constructs the objects, initalizes the default values.
Parameters:
assetsPath - Path to the assets directory from the project's root dir (usually the one containing the .nmml file).
tilemapAddCallback - a callback that is called every time a tilemap is loaded.
objectAddCallback - a callback that is called every time an object (sprite) is loaded.

Instance Variables

private assetsPath : String

Path to the assets directory.

private layers : Hash<org.flixel.FlxGroup>

A table that contains all the layers regardless of type, by the name of the layer.

private masterLayer : org.flixel.FlxGroup

The group that contains all other groups.

private name : String

Name of the level.

private objectAddCallback : ObjectAddCallback

A callback that is called whenever an object is loaded.

private tilemapAddCallback : TilemapAddCallback

A callback that is called whenever a tilemap is loaded.

private tilemaps : Hash<org.flixel.FlxTilemap>

A table that contains the loaded tilemaps stored by name of the layer.

Instance Methods

public getLayer(name : String) : org.flixel.FlxGroup

Returns a layer with the name name.
Parameters:
name - name of the layer.
Returns:
the layer or null if it doesn't exist.

public getMasterLayer() : org.flixel.FlxGroup

Returns the master layer.
Returns:
the master layer.

public getTilemap(name : String) : org.flixel.FlxTilemap

Returns a tilemap with the name name.
Parameters:
name - name of the tilemap.
Returns:
the tilemap or null if it doesn't exist.
